Feature Notes:
Advanced General Training: +1 General Feat (up to 7th level)
Ancestry Feats: 5 selections
Barbarian Feats: 11 selections
Fury Instinct: +1 Class Feat
General Feats: 5 selections
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Instinct: 1 selection/Has the Anathema feature
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Acute Vision: Has the Darkvision feature during rage
Adopted Ancestry (Human): May take Human ancestry feats
Anathema: May not perform acts or cast spells prohibited by barbarian instinct
Desperate Wrath: (F) Gives -2 Armor Class, -1 saves, and +2 attacks until rage ends when reduced to 164 or fewer Hit Points
Nocturnal Senses: Low-Light Vision becomes Darkvision while raging and imprecise scent range increases to 60'
Perception: +30 (wisdom; master)
Skill Modifiers:
Abadar Lore: +34 (intelligence; %1) Giant Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Occultism: +4 (intelligence; untrained)
Absalom Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Goblin Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Outer Rifts Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Acrobatics: +3 (dexterity; untrained) Heraldry Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +4 (charisma; untrained)
Aquatic Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +4 (charisma; untrained) Religion: +4 (wisdom; untrained)
Arcana: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Iomedae Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary) Society: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Athletics: +30 (strength; master) Kobold Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert) Stabling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Cavern Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Labor Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Stealth: +3 (dexterity; untrained)
Crafting: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Legal Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Survival: +4 (wisdom; untrained)
Deception: +4 (charisma; untrained) Leshy Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Tanning Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Diplomacy: +4 (charisma; untrained) Medicine: +4 (wisdom; untrained) Thievery: +3 (dexterity; untrained)
Driving Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary) Mercantile Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Tripkee Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)

Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Abadar Lore): Skill Legendary (Abadar Lore)
Additional Lore (Driving Lore): Skill Legendary (Driving Lore)
Additional Lore (Iomedae Lore): Skill Legendary (Iomedae Lore)
Barbarian Skills: Skill Trained (Athletics; Choose 7 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Natural Skill: Skill Trained (Choose 2 from any)
Perception Mastery: Perception Master
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Outer Rifts Lore): Skill Trained (Outer Rifts Lore)
Skill Training (Tanning Lore): Skill Trained (Tanning Lore)
Skilled Human: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Acute Scent: Has R30' imprecise scent during rage
Adrenaline Rush: +1 Athletics to lift, Escape, and Force Open during rage
Dubious Knowledge: Failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the income
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Quick Jump: Can use High Jump and Long Jump as 1 action without an initial Stride
Raging Athlete: Has a 35' climb and swim Speed, -10 jump DC, and 5' and 20' vertical and horizontal Leaps during rage
Read Lips: Can read the lips of those who can be seen clearly; in difficult circumstances, this requires a Society check and may inflict fascinated and off-guard
Spiritual Guides: (R) Rerolls a normal failure on a Perception or skill check once per day
Streetwise: Can use Society to Gather Information and to Recall Knowledge in familiar settlements
Supernatural Senses: Reduces the flat check DC to target a concealed or hidden foe to 3 or 9
Titan Wrestler: Can use Disarm, Grapple, Shove, and Trip on creatures up to 2 sizes larger
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures to Recall Knowledge on a trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master proficiency provide additional information
Combat
Hit Points: 328 Armor Class: 41 (dexterity (3 max); master) Class DC: Barbarian: 40 (strength; master)
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Longsword (+30 1d8+4 S/P; strength; master); Shield Bash (+30 1d4+4 B; strength; master); Shield Spikes (+30 1d6+4 P; strength; master)
Combat Notes:
Animal Skin: Defense Expert (Unarmored Defense)
Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Brutality: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Devastator: Class Master (Barbarian)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Fury Instinct: Increases added rage damage to 12
Greater Weapon Specialization: Has increased Weapon Specialization effects
Invulnerable Rager: Defense Master (Heavy Armor)
Medium Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Mighty Rage: Class Expert (Barbarian)
Multitalented: +1 Class Feat (multiclass dedication)
Specialization Ability: Has increased instinct ability rage effects
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Weaponry (Flying Talon): Weapon Familiarity (Flying Talon)
Weapon Mastery: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Animal Skin: +3 Armor Class in no armor during rage
Animalistic Brutality: (1) Unarmed attack gains backswing, forceful, parry, or razing trait until rage ends
Annihilating Swing: (2) Melee Strike ignores target resistances, destroys non-magical objects with Hardness up to 20, and destroys magical objects with Hardness up to 20 with a successful counteract check
Awesome Blow: Success or critical success on an Athletics vs. Fortitude check after using Knockback inflicts success or critical success effects of Shove and Trip
Barreling Charge: (2) Successful Athletics vs. Fortitude allows Striding through foes' spaces to make a melee Strike
Bashing Charge: (2) +1 to Force Open an obstacle during a double Stride
Bestial Rage (Ape): Can use fists to inflict 1d12+12 HP bludgeoning during rage
Bounce Back: (F) Recovery from dying does not increase the wounded condition once per day
Brutal Bully: A successful Disarm, Grapple, Reposition, Shove, or Trip inflicts 4 HP bludgeoning during rage
Brutal Critical: Critical melee hits inflict an additional damage die and 2 damage dice persistent bleed damage
Brutality: Critical hits with a melee weapon or unarmed attack inflict its critical specialization effect during rage
Cleave: (R) Makes a melee Strike on an adjacent foe after killing a foe or knocking one unconscious during rage
Collateral Thrash: Thrash affects another adjacent foe (save basic Reflex)
Come And Get Me: (1) Suffers off-guard and +2 HP foe damage until rage ends; successful attackers suffer off-guard until the end of the next turn, and a successful Strike on a foe gives self 4 temporary Hit Points, or 8 temporary Hit Points on a critical success
Contagious Rage: Can use Share Rage unlimited times, also sharing instinct and specialization abilities
Devastator: Successful melee Strikes ignore 10 points of physical damage resistance
Disarming Assault: (1) Successful melee Strike allows an Athletics check to Disarm
Draconic Rage: Can inflict +16 HP acid damage instead of +12 HP weapon damage during rage
Dragon's Rage Breath: (2) Breath inflicts 20d6 damage in a 30' cone once per 10 min (save basic Reflex)
Dragon's Rage Wings: (1) Gains a 35' fly Speed during rage
Embrace The Pain: (R) Successful Athletics check inflects Grapple or Disarm after a foe melee hit
Follow-Up Assault: (1) Follows a melee Strike miss with another with the backswing and forceful traits
Friendly Toss: (2) Throws an adjacent ally to a space within 30', where it can use a Reaction for a melee Strike against a foe
Furious Bully: +2 Athletics for attacks during rage
Furious Finish: (1) Strike inflicts additional damage equal to the number of rounds remaining in rage, ending rage and causing fatigue until 10 min rest
Furious Grab: (1) Grapples a foe after a successful Strike during rage
Furious Sprint: (2) Strides 175' in a straight line, or 280' by using an additional action, during rage
Furious Vengeance: (R) Makes a melee Strike against a foe that inflicts a critical hit
Giant's Lunge: (1) Extends reach of melee weapons and unarmed attacks to 10' until rage ends
Giant's Stature: (1) Increases size to Large, giving +5' reach and clumsy 1, until rage ends
Great Cleave: Can continue to use Cleave on adjacent foes for as long as Strikes incapacitate
Impaling Thrust: (2) Successful Strike with a piercing melee weapon inflicts grabbed, then persistent bleed damage equal to the weapon's damage dice
Instinctive Strike: Melee Strikes against scent-detected foes ignore concealed and hidden
Intimidating Strike: (2) Successful melee Strike inflicts frightened 1, or frightened 2 on a critical hit
Invulnerable Rager: May use Quick-Tempered action in heavy armor
Knockback: (1) Shoves a foe 5' after a successful Strike during rage
Mage Hunter: (2) Successful Strike on a spell caster inflicts stupefied 1 for 1 rd, or stupefied 2 on a critical hit
Mighty Rage: (F) Immediately uses a 1-action rage action when starting to rage; using 2 actions to enter rage allows using a 2-action rage action
Moment Of Clarity: (1) Allows using concentration actions for the remainder of the turn during rage
No Escape: (R) Stride keeps pace with a retreating foe during rage
Overpowering Charge: Successful Barreling Charge moves inflict 4 HP bludgeoning, or 8 HP and off-guard until the end of the next turn on a critical hit
Oversized Throw: (2) Uses an item from surroundings to make a R20' ranged strike that deals 3d10 HP bludgeoning
Penetrating Projectile: (2) Makes a ranged or thrown piercing weapon Strike on each creature in a 30' line
Perfect Clarity: (R) Ends rage to gain a +2 reroll on a failed attack or Will save
Predator's Pounce: (1) Strikes after a Stride in light or no armor during rage
Quick-Tempered: (F) Enters rage during initiative when unencumbered and in medium or lighter armor
Rage: (1) Gains 24 temporary Hit Points and +12 HP melee damage, or +6 HP with an agile weapon, and suffers -1 Armor Class and no concentration actions for 1 min; requires 1 min between rages
Raging Intimidation: Can use Demoralize and Scare To Death during rage
Raging Thrower: +12 HP thrown weapon damage, and Brutal Critical and Devastator effects apply to thrown weapons during rage
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Renewed Vigor: (1) Gains 14 temporary Hit Points, or 24 after attacking during rage
Resounding Blow: (2) Successful melee Strike inflicts deafened for 1 rd, or for 1 min with a critical hit
Scars Of Steel: (R) Gives resistance 14 to the damage from the triggering critical hit once per day
Scouring Rage: (F) Upon entering rage, 20' emanation inflicts 20 HP modified rage damage type on foes (save basic Fortitude)
Second Wind: Can rage again immediately after ending rage, suffering fatigue afterwards until 10 min rest
Shake It Off: (1) Reduces a frightened condition by 1 and a sickened condition by 1, 2, or 3 with a fail, success, or critical success on a Fortitude save during rage
Share Rage: (1) R30' Gives an ally the effects of Rage once per rage
Shattering Blows: Strikes ignore 10 Hardness
Silencing Strike: (1) Successful melee Strike inflicts stunned 1, requiring a successful DC flat check to use linguistic actions (save Fortitude negates; critical success inflicts stunned 3)
Spirit Rage: May inflict +13 HP positive or negative damage, along with ghost touch, instead of +12 HP weapon damage during rage
Spirit's Wrath: (1) Makes a R120' +32 spirit Strike during rage that inflicts 4d8+4 HP negative or positive damage; a critical hit also inflicts frightened 1
Spirits'Interference: (1) Imposes a DC 5 flat check requirement on foe ranged Strikes until rage ends
Sudden Charge: (2) Makes a melee Strike after 2 Strides
Sudden Leap: (2) Makes a melee Strike while Leaping, High Jumping, or Long Jumping up to 70'
Sunder Enchantment: Can use Sunder Spell to counteract an unattended magic item or 1 possessed by the target to make it mundane for 10 min
Sunder Spell: (2) Successful Strike on a creature, object, or spell manifestation allows an attempt to counteract a spell or magical effect
Swipe: (2) Melee Strike attacks 2 adjacent foes
Tangle Of Battle: (R) Makes a Grapple attempt immediately after a critical hit
Terrifying Howl: (1) A successful Intimidate Demoralizes all foes in a 30' radius during rage
Thrash: (1) Inflicts 16 HP bludgeoning plus specialization damage on a grabbed foe during rage (save basic Fortitude)
Titan Mauler: Can use weapons made for a larger creature, suffering clumsy 1 and gaining +18 HP weapon damage, instead of gaining +12 HP weapon damage during rage
Titan's Stature: Giant's Stature can increase size to Huge, giving +10' reach and clumsy 1, until rage ends
Unbalancing Sweep: (3) Makes a Shove or Trip against 3 foes within reach
Vengeful Strike: (R) While using Come And Get Me, responds to a successful foe attack with an immediate Strike; using in response to a critical hit is a free action
Vicious Evisceration: (2) Strike also inflicts drained 1, or drained 2 on a critical success during rage
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +4, +6, or +8 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Whirlwind Strike: (3) Makes individual Strikes at the current multiple attack penalty against all foes within reach
Whirlwind Toss: (2) Collateral Thrash affects all adjacent foes
Wounded Rage: (R) Enters rage upon taking damage
Save: Fortitude: +32 (constitution; legendary); Reflex: +27 (dexterity; expert); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Greater Juggernaut: Save Legendary (Fortitude)
Indomitable Will: Save Master (Will)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Draconic Arrogance: +2 vs. emotion effects during rage
Greater Juggernaut: Critical failures on Fortitude saves are normal failures, and failed Fortitude saves inflict half damage
Impressive Landing: (R) Reduces falling damage by 10' and inflicts 5 HP bludgeoning and difficult terrain in a 5' emanation
Indomitable Will: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Inner Strength: (1) Reduces enfeebled condition by 1
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Raging Resistance (Animal): Has resistance 7 to piercing and slashing during rage
Raging Resistance (Dragon): Has resistance 7 to piercing and acid during rage
Raging Resistance (Fury): Has resistance 7 to physical weapon damage during rage
Raging Resistance (Giant): Has resistance 7 to bludgeoning and a choice of cold, electricity, or fire during rage
Raging Resistance (Spirit): Has resistance 7 to negative and undead during rage
Unstoppable Juggernaut: Has resistance 7 to all damage, resistance 12 during rage, and can retain 1 Hit Point and suffer wounded 2 when reduced to 0 Hit Points during rage
Magic
Magic Notes:
Dragon Transformation: (1) Transforms into a Large dragon, as with 6th-rank Dragon Form, with +20 fly Speed, +12 dragon Strikes, and +14 HP breath weapon damage during rage
Quaking Stomp: (1) Invokes Earthquake effects during rage once per 10 min
Notes
Validation Errors:
Barbarian Instinct Allocation: 1 available vs. 6 allocated
Class Feats Allocation: 13 available vs. 82 allocated
Nocturnal Senses Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 6 and low-light vision feature or scent feature
